short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto clicks the Channel Points bonus chest for you, so you can watch streams in peace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto clicks the Channel Points bonus chest for you, so you can watch streams in peace.

Make sure to refresh Twitch after installing the extension.
